short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your screen easily using the screen recorder and screen capture tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record and Capture screenshots effortlessly with our Chrome extension!

Customize the screen while recording and capture screenshots using the powerful editing tools.
